name: Twitter Large JPEG Image
summary: A JPG_LARGE file is an image created when a Google Chrome user downloads a large-sized image from Twitter. It is saved in the standard JPEG format, but with a custom file extension. To open a JPG_LARGE file, change the extension to ".jpg," then open it as you would any .JPG file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: JPG_LARGE file open in Google Chrome
images.alt: JPG_LARGE file open in Google Chrome
